title: I am trying to make a payment of my court ordered debt. What is the payment type I refer it too? (i.e: personal tax return etc.)
question: I have no extension payment plan with them I would just like to know what to select so I don't choose the wrong one. There are a few options that I can choose from.
question_tags: Bankruptcy,Debt,Bankruptcy and debt,Lawsuits and disputes,Tax return
answers:
You have not provided sufficient information to answer your question.
Do as ordered by court.
Retain counsel to review order and facts to advise you on payment procedure.
More information is needed to give you useful advice. BK is not a DIY project. You need to consult a BK lawyer. Many of us offer a free consultation by phone or in person.

Need more details to answer your question. What type of court ordered debt? Civil, criminal, repetition, administrative? Are you already in bankruptcy? Why would you pay this debt over other debt you have? Select from what kind of choices? Hope this perspective helps.
